parameter.value: God, yes! Please bring me food, I'm starving. Then we can discuss how I can get out of here, but for heavens sake, I'm dying of hunger! Apples, please! 10 would do!
I am trapped within this cell. I fear there is no way out.
The black knights captured me and siezed this place.
My brother is the fisherman Jacob.
Jacob lives on Hagal. He's a nice man, and my brother.
A human... but not a black knight? How did you get in here? I need food!
